    • Constructor Detail

      • NDCGTopNMetric

        public NDCGTopNMetric(java.lang.String pre,
              java.lang.String sfx,
              int listSize,
              ItemSelector candidates,
              ItemSelector exclude)

        Construct a new nDCG Top-N metric.

        Parameters:
        pre - the prefix label for this evaluation, or null for no prefix.
        sfx - the suffix label for this evaluation, or null for no suffix.
        listSize - The number of recommendations to fetch.
        candidates - The candidate selector.
        exclude - The exclude selector.

    • Method Detail

      • createContext

        public MeanAccumulator createContext(Attributed algo,
                            TTDataSet ds,
                            Recommender rec)
        Description copied from interface: Metric

        Create the context for an experimental condition (algorithm/data set pair).

        Parameters:
        algo - The algorithm.
        ds - The data set.
        rec - The LensKit recommender, if applicable. This can be null for an external algorithm that does not provide a LensKit recommender.
        Returns:
        The accumulator. This will be passed to Metric.measureUser(TestUser, Object). If the metric does not accumulate any results, this method can return null.

      • getPrefix

        protected java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric

        A prefix to be applied to column names. If non-null, this prefix will be applied and separated with a period.

        Overrides:

        Returns:
        The prefix to apply to column names.

        Description copied from class: AbstractMetric
